review.title: Disappointing
review.reviewText: Room not what I expected for the price. The hotel does not have a restaurant and its location makes it very dificoult to find a good place to eat. Very poor brakfast.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is totally aisolated, if you do not have a car you are done!

review.title: Nice hotel.
review.reviewText: Yes we Would stay here again.  Close to gas stations,  freeways.  Not noisy, clean, nice staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Hotel only had 2 valet carts for loading luggage.
review.locationRemarks: Ball park, pier 39, down town, all within good driving distance without being down town.

review.reviewText: Clean and nice staff. I stay hear a lot and it is always a great place to stay

managementResponses.response:
Dear Anthony,

Thank you very much for your great review!  We appreciate the praise of our staff and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Warm regards,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Great hotel!
review.reviewText: We really enjoy staying here. The staff is very nice and helpful.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Sher,

Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We appreciate your business and our staff looks forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Sincerely,

review.title: The room has everything you need!
review.reviewText: Very comfortable bed. It is nice it is in a separate room. Couch could be better,but it was fine. Always ice water,fresh fruit & coffee-tea in lobby. Staff is very friendly. Nice quiet room. Would stay again.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Richard,

Thank you very much for your review of our hotel!  We appreciate the praise of our team and are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Sincerely,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: warmly staff, comfortable room, nice surroundings.

review.title: Designed for those wanting a budget long stay
review.reviewText: Nothing special at all. Rather tired property that is clearly set up for those wanting to be there a week or more. Couldnt turn on aircon due to the noise it made. Fine but not at all flash.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: Very friendly and helpful staff, it was like home from home

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Free, frequent and fast shuttle service to and from the airport. Well appointed rooms. Clean rooms, lobby, and corridors. Nice continental breakfast. Air conditioning did not work for us but it was only a minor inconvenience as it was cool outside and the room was only slightly on the warm side.
review.positiveRemarks: Close proximity to the airport with convenient shuttle service.
review.negativeRemarks: Better coffee and of course make sure the AC works.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport and South San Francisco harbor.

review.reviewText: very pleasant experience, the whole family enjoyed

managementResponses.response:
Dear guest,

Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay.  We are pleased you enjoyed our location and in room kitchen.  

Best regards,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Greatet Hotel.  Great Staff
review.reviewText:
We traveled to San Francisco for a family trip.  Larkspur Landing South San Francisco was a great choice for us to stay at. Located close to the Airport and close to transportation including commuter Train station only 12 minute walk from the hotel.  The commuter "Cal-train" takes you right downtown San Francisco in about 20 minutes.  Making this hotel an economical alternative to potentially expensive downtown San Francisco hotels.  
This is a "suite" hotel giving you a small kitchen area with fridge, stove, sink, dishes, etc.  If you plan to stay in San Francisco for a few to several days, this is a great home base to travel from.  I would highly recommend the Larkspur Landing.
review.positiveRemarks: Very good proximity for transportation to Airport, Downtown, and available Car Rentals.  Friendly accommodating staff.
review.negativeRemarks: An improvement would to make available a Suite with 2 real beds.  Instead of a great King Size bed and an uncomfortable pull out.  We booked 4 guests.

managementResponses.response:
Dear guest,

Thank you for your great review and praise of our staff.  

Please come back soon,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Very nice
review.reviewText: I would recommend this hotel to anyone is clean great staff quite

managementResponses.response:
Dear Esme,

Thank you so much for your great review!!  We are so happy you enjoyed the comfort of our beds and our location.  

Please come back soon,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Great Hotel!
review.reviewText: Our suite was amazing! The bed was sooooo comfortable i wanted to buy it. It was super easy to get to although my gps told me to turn the opposite way the hotel was located but it was easy to find either way. Its close to everything and its not directly in the city which is awesome since i dont care for all the noise, traffic, etc. The breakfast was basic. There is almost no seating in the area where they have the breakfast so most people just took the food up to their rooms. Would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Very convenient to everything and spacious
review.reviewText: We were up graded to an excutive suite and it was so roomy. The beds were comfortable and the breakfast excellent. We actually looked forward to coming back to the room after a day of sightseeing. Location was very easy to find. Defiantly will stay there again!
review.locationRemarks: Easy to find with plenty of parking

managementResponses.response:
Dear Gae,

Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed many of our amenities and location.  We hope to welcome you back again in the future.

Warm regards,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Nice hotel in very good position
review.reviewText:
Good stay, excelent cleaness and good breackfast.
Wi Fi excellent, pleasant spa water massage.
Front desk very active and helpfull.
Position of the hotel is good to go easy to San Francisco and to International Airport.
review.positiveRemarks:
Accommodation in nice suite provided of all necessary for a good stay.
Easy also to call for restaurant room service at good rate of cost/benefict
review.negativeRemarks: The breackfast room should be larger in order to host more people sit at table
review.locationRemarks: If you have a car the location is outstanding and fully safe

managementResponses.response:
Dear guest,

Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our staff, location and complimentary airport shuttle.

Sincerely,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Nice hotel, free shuttle to the airport
review.reviewText: Nice people good breakfast good tv good bathroom good location

managementResponses.response:
Dear Kenny,

Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are very happy you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Nice place to stay
review.reviewText: I like this hotel and this hotel will be one of my best hotel lists.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Belle,

Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  We appreciate your excellent rating and are thrilled you enjoyed our location and complimentary shuttles.

Best regards,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Excellent hotel slightly out of the city
review.reviewText: Wonderful place. Large, great amenities, comfortable, and the staff was great. It is about 15 out of the city, but it was such a great price for us (we have three young boys and needed a larger space that wasn't going to make us go broke). They have a free shuttle that goes to Union Square on Fri and Sat and free airport shuttles. The area itself is safe but very corporate and boring. Still--a totally wonderful experience.

managementResponses.response:
Dear guest,

Thank you for your positive review!  Our team is pleased to hear you enjoyed our complimentary amenities and convenient location.  

Please come back soon,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Close to airport with free shuttle service!
review.reviewText: They offer free coffee all day and night,both decaf and regular, as well as an assortment of teas.  Free chocolate chip cookies every evening! I had an overall very good experience there due to their friendly staff, clean rooms, reasonable prices. Approx 20 dollars for uber ride from here to downtown SF one way if you do not plan on renting a car.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Kristen,

Thank you for your great review of our hotel and sharing your experience.  We are thrilled to hear our staff, complimentary breakfast and shuttle were enjoyable.

Please come back soon,
Debbie Gudmundson, General Manager

review.title: Great experience
review.reviewText: Easy to get hotel shuttle from airport, very friendly hotel staff, breakfast is pretty good, and absolutely loved the free shuttle into Union Square!
